ideal:
[FILL: Complete experimental plan.
Example: 'Express both variants in E. coli BL21(DE3) with His-tag, purify by Ni-NTA + size exclusion. Measure enzyme kinetics (kcat/Km) at 4C, 15C, 25C, 37C at atmospheric pressure. For pressure: use a high-pressure spectrophotometric cell to measure activity at 1, 100, 200, 500 atm at 4C. Predict: deep-sea variant maintains >50% activity at 4C/200atm where human homolog retains <10%. Thermal stability by DSF: expect lower Tm for deep-sea variant (flexibility tradeoff).']
